dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd try to act normal and avoid any suspicious behavior, possibly deflecting attention by engaging in casual conversation or expressing agreement with the group. "Hey Alice, Bob, how was your day? Anything interesting happen?"

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Alice
